colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030A *, ,(CES BLA MA MCHOG GSUM GYI BKA' DRIN DRAN NAS BSTOD CING GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA BYIN RLABS KYI GTER CHEN ZHES BYA BA 'DI LA, BLO GROS BZANG POS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA 'DZIN, ZHES SOGS KYI SHLOO KA ZHE BRGYAD LAS BLA MA BLO BZANG ZHES SOGS KYI SHLOO KA GNYIS MA GTOGS PA BDAG GI DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RIN PO CHE MTSAN BRJOD PAR DKA' BA ^MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS LA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DBANG PO DZNY'A NO BHYA: PA t'U'I MTSAN GZHAN DBYANGS CAN DGYES PA'I LANG TSO BZHAD PA'I SDES SKAL LDAN GYI BU SLOB LA LJAGS RTZOM GNANG BA YIN NO, ,SO THAR RGYA CHEN SOGS SHLOO KA BCU DRUG NI DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG LAS BYUNG, GZHAN RNAMS DGE LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN MKHAS GRUB MANG PO'I GSUNG LAS GYI NA PA BDAG GIS BTUS TE YI GER BTAB PAS GO RIM 'TSOL BA TSAD LDAN GYI GSUNG RAB DKRUGS PA SOGS KYI NYES PA YOD DO COG BLA MA LHA BSRUNG TSES BDAG BCAS LA DMIGS MED KYI NGANG DU BSHAGS SHING LEGS CHA YOD NA RGYAL BSTAN YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR SNGO BA'O, ,)
